typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		age,
		country
	)) ~> sink1
